about_the_game:
Back to reality is a narrative puzzle adventure. Help Lukas, a mobile game addicted teenager, who was mistakenly sucked into the new mobile game world franchise by famous internet investor Alon Risk. In this totally fictional and super crazy world, where the most important things are likes, views and diamonds, you have to assist Lukas to survive, solve puzzles and - maybe - get back to reality.

  • Survive
    Help Lukas escape and survive deadly traps, crazy creatures and psychedelic trips in time based action sequences. He de finitely needs your help so think fast!

  • Make a living
    Go to work for him. You can spend your hard earned money to buy fancy things for Lukas apartment. In the evening, you can watch intriguing commercials together. SO MUCH FUN!!!

  • Make friends
    The good news is that even tough you don't understand most of the characters in the game at all, there are a few strange guys you can befriend. Welcome to the club of weirdos.

  • Find a way out
    Even if Lukas likes the life in the game, you should not forget: this is not real! So make an effort and help him to find a way out of here. Or don't you wanna leave now either?

name: Back To Reality

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM

short_description: Oh no, this poor boy is trapped in a mobile game ad. Unfortunately, he's also completely incompetent. So please help him not to die. And to earn a living. Sounds awesome, right? RIGHT? Now who is actually trapped here? Him or you?!
